note.p: Clerk. Of Sheffield. Banker’s clerk, 1861. Cashier at iron works, 1881, 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/3470/4/1), 1881 (RG11/4633/117/23), 1891 (RG12/3804/142/28)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 October 2017)
